venue.name: Adams Mill Restaurant Upstairs Pub

item.description:
The Adams Mill Trail (1.93 mile loop) starts to left of restaurant (Adams Mill), follows along a dike to the Hockanum River, up the river to a railroad trestle, across the trestle to steps and downstream on Eighth Utilities property along the river to Adams Street, along sidewalk back to parking lot.

Somewhat difficult walk in places on return trip due to erosion of the trail, steep hills in a couple places, narrow ledges, beautiful deep hemlock and pine forest, scenic sandstone gorge, view old mill and dam.

Park at restaurant, 165 Adams Street, and meet there at 5:30 PM. Watch for Kevin's blue Dodge Grandcaravan Sport. The hike should start at about 5:45 PM and take a little over an hour and end before 7 PM. No meal is planned after the hike.

Kevin S (http://hiking.meetup....) is leading on this one so please direct questions to him.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Hike at the Adams Mill Trail in Manchester CT
